name: Pidgeotto

evolution.description: Pidgeotto can evolve into Pidgeot at level 14 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 11 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Bird Pokémon. This Pokémon is full of vitality. It constantly flies around its large territory in search of prey.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: This Pokémon ignores disadvantage when it relates to sight.

abilities.name: Tangled Feet
abilities.description: Attacks against this Pokémon have disadvantage when it is confused.

abilities.name: Big Pecks
abilities.description: This Pokémon's AC cannot be reduced by an opponent's moves.
